title.rendered: SUPREMA XPASS 2 OUTDOOR COMPACT RFID DEVICE

content.rendered:
XPass 2 is an outdoor compact RFID reader based on Suprema’s state-of-the-art RFID technology and multi-hardware platform. With the multi-form factor technology, mullion-type, gangbox-type, and gangbox keypad-type are all supported which provides perfect installation in various environments.

Features

  • Mullion design enables flexible placement in narrow spaces and door frames
  • 1 GHz CPU
  • Dual-frequency RFID technology
  • AES encrypted NFC host card emulation for Android
  • AES 128-bit encrypted BLE communication for iOS and Android
  • Holds up to 1,000,000 text logs
  • Tamper-resistant housing
  • CE, FCC, KC, RoHS, REACH, WEEE, and SIG certified
